epa_programs (DATA) named vector with program counts

Source: R/data_epa_programs.R
epa_programs.Rd

Named vector of EPA programs and facility count for each.

Usage

epa_programs

Format

An object of class character of length 8.

Details

Also see

  • EPA documentation describing each program code aka data source.

  • 2021-05/frs_program_abbreviations_and_names.xlsx

Also see frs_by_programid
